messages.title: ONLY LABOUR CAN GIVE YOU A FINAL SAY VOTE ON BREXIT
messages.content: Labour has pledged a final say vote on a sensible Brexit deal, with ‘remain’ as the alternative option. We need to avoid the damage the Tories’ Brexit deal will do both to jobs and the NHS and, unlike the Lib Dems’ proposal, do it in a way which won’t further divide our society. A final vote is the only credible way to resolve Brexit with an option to stay in the EU. I’ve pledged to campaign for ‘remain’ in any future vote.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has pledged a final say vote on a sensible Brexit deal, with ‘remain’ as the alternative option.

“We’ve used our NHS recently and the staff do a fantastic job in difficult circumstances. Our NHS is under-resourced and we’re voting Labour to save it from more Tory neglect, and to stop a Trump trade deal sell off.”

community.content: Jeff runs weekly advice surgeries, regular public ‘meet your MP’ events and is a regular visitor at local schools and community events.
